00038 void FilterHighPass :: init()
00039 {   
00040 
00041     pValid_.push_back(aw::pNameOperand1);
00042     pTypeMap_[aw::pNameOperand1] = aw::gTypeMono;
00043

00072 // =============================================================================
00073 double FilterHighPass :: getValueAtSample(aw::SampleTimeType st)
00074 {
00075     sr_ = sys_->getSamplingRate();
00076 
00077     value_ = pMap_[aw::pNameOperand1]->getValueAtSample(st);
00078     fqCutoff_ = pMap_[aw::pNameRate]->getValueAtSample(st);
00079 
00080 
00081     fqCutoff_ = getValueWithContextToFrequency(fqCutoff_, aw::pNameRate, sr_);
00082     fqCutoff_ *= 2.0 * aw::pi;
00083 
00084     w_ = 2.0 * sr_;
00085     norm_ = 1.0 / (fqCutoff_ + w_);
00086     a0_ = w_ * norm_;
00087     a1_ = -a0_;
00088     b1_ = (w_ - fqCutoff_) * norm_;
00089 
00090     value_ = value_*a0_ + zNeg1_*a1_ + zNeg1_*b1_;
00091     zNeg1_ = value_;
00092 
00093     return value_;
00094 };
